main event: A witness observed a bright light in the sky that behaved erratically, initially mistaking it for an aircraft near Princeton, New Jersey.
interesting points: The light was first mistaken for an aircraft as it was close to the Princeton Airport., The object emitted a bright beam and a small non-blinking light., The witness observed the object over a period of several nights, noticing it hovering and moving erratically., Another observer confirmed seeing a disc shape through binoculars., Two F-104 aircraft reportedly appeared in pursuit of the object.
sighted object: a bright light with unusual behavior
witness description: A professional newsman and his family members.
